I am a senior undergraduate majoring in Computer Science and Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar, India. I am a creative, diligent, and result-oriented individual who always looks for new opportunities to grow.

My research interests include Applied Machine Learning, Bayesian Learning, Computer Vision, and Data Science. I am passionate about applying Artificial Intelligence to critical applications with a broader impact.
